name: Vegan Chicken Alfredo
description: This vegan chicken Alfredo with textured vegetable protein is so delicious, creamy, rich, and decadent. No dairy or meat needed!
recipeIngredient: 1 small potato, peeled and cut into very small pieces
3.5 oz textured soy stripes/chunks ((also known as textured vegetable protein))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potato for about 10 minutes or until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the potato for about 10 minutes or until tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the TVP for about 10 minutes in vegetable broth on very low heat. Once they're ready, let them cool down a bit and then use your hands and squeeze out as much water as you can. They're kind of like little sponges. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the TVP for about 10 minutes in vegetable broth on very low heat. Once they're ready, let them cool down a bit and then use your hands and squeeze out as much water as you can. They're kind of like little sponges. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the fettuccine according to the instructions on the package. Cook the broccoli for about 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the fettuccine according to the instructions on the package. Cook the broccoli for about 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Then make the vegan Alfredo sauce: Heat some oil in a large pan (you'll need this one later on to combine the sauce and the pasta) and sauté the onion and the garlic for about 3 minutes. Put in a blender with the rest of the ingredients and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Then make the vegan Alfredo sauce: Heat some oil in a large pan (you'll need this one later on to combine the sauce and the pasta) and sauté the onion and the garlic for about 3 minutes. Put in a blender with the rest of the ingredients and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat one tablespoon of canola oil in a frypan and add the soy stripes. Season with soy sauce, liquid smoke, paprika powder, onion and garlic powder, salt, and black pepper and pan-fry for about 5 minutes or until crispy and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat one tablespoon of canola oil in a frypan and add the soy stripes. Season with soy sauce, liquid smoke, paprika powder, onion and garlic powder, salt, and black pepper and pan-fry for about 5 minutes or until crispy and golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Put the vegan alfredo sauce in a large pan and cook for a minute until it becomes creamy and thick. Add the pasta, the broccoli and the vegan "chicken". Sprinkle with fresh parsley and black pepper and serve with lemon slices.
